words.hint: A round fruit with firm, white flesh and a green or red skin.
A long curved fruit which grows in clusters and has soft pulpy flesh and yellow skin when ripe.
A round juicy citrus fruit with a tough bright reddish-yellow rind.
A berry, typically green (classified as white), purple, red, or black, growing in clusters on a grapevine, eaten as fruit, and used in making wine.
A sweet soft red fruit with a seed-studded surface.
A small, round, blue-black berry from a North American shrub.
A fleshy, oval, yellowish-red tropical fruit with a C-shaped seed.
A large tropical fruit with a tough orange or brownish skin and a top of short, stiff leaves.
A large, round or oval-shaped fruit with a thick green rind and sweet, juicy, red or pink flesh containing many black seeds.
A fruit with a thin hairy skin, green flesh, and black seeds.
